short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily see the localtime of many countries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curious about the time across the globe or need to stay in sync with different time zones? Look no further! "What Time Is It There?" is your go-to Chrome extension, designed to provide you with the current times in cities worldwide and all states in the US, all in a uniform and easy-to-read format: D MMM YYY HH:mm:ss.

Key Features:

- Global Time Zones: Instantly view the current time in major cities around the world. From New York to Tokyo, London to Sydney, "What Time Is It There?" keeps you connected.

- US State Times: Get a comprehensive list of local times from California to New York, all presented in the consistent format you prefer.

- Intuitive Interface: With a user-friendly design, "What Time Is It There?" makes it easy to add, remove, or rearrange cities and states. Effortlessly navigate through the world's time zones with just a few clicks.

- Quick Search: Find any city or state in seconds with the quick search functionality. "What Time Is It There?" ensures that you can access the information you need promptly.

Why "What Time Is It There?"

- Efficiency: Streamline your workflow and scheduling by having instant access to global time zones and US state times, all in a consistent and easy-to-read format.

- Versatility: Perfect for professionals working across borders, students studying abroad, or anyone with an interest in different time zones.

- Accuracy: "What Time Is It There?" provides precise, real-time information, so you can plan your activities with confidence.

Download "What Time Is It There?" now and make time zone management a breeze. Stay connected, stay organized, and stay on time with this essential Chrome extension!
